artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Jōshūya Jūzō / Jūbei
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription: Titles of images: {Iwa} (Rock), {Kame no ko} (Small Tortoise), {Karasu} (Crow), {Tōjin} (Chinese Man), {Katatsumuri} (Snail), {Kitsune} (Fox), {Shachihoko} (Fish Shape Statue), {Mimizuku} (Owl)
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From New Edition of Shadow Making (Shinban, kagebōshi zukushi)
title: Eight Shadow Figures
